ygData.subject: Re: Hot Rod/DrillBit
ygData.msgSnippet: Diamond:: She followed Drillbit and walked along side him.  I hope I can prove myself worthy to you and your group. Feline2: She looked at him, trying to see

Diamond::
She followed Drillbit and walked along side him. " I hope I can prove 
myself worthy to you and your group."

Feline2:
She looked at him, trying to see the truth in his words. He spoke, 
but she coudln't understand what he said. (Can't speak Japanese) She 
closed her eyes as he kissed her. She felt her spark run wild and her 
whole body tingled. She wasn't sure if it was his kiss or the loss of 
mech fluid. She pulled back. She was programmed by Squizzy to be 
loyal to the Allience, and with them, she must stay. "I can't leave 
the my leader. Zardus is my leader. I can not ignore my programming." 
She cried silently and kept looking at HotRod.  She wanted to go with 
him, buther program over road her emotion chips.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "I'm sure KitKat will allow you in. Follow me, the base is close."
> He started to walk away. After a few feet, he turned waiting for 
her.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Her words were fusion blasts to him. Kill her? Never!
> "You are right, the Matrix has made my programing Maximal. The
> reprograming you did is gone. But one thing remained, my love for 
you!"
> He put his arm around her, holding her close.
> "Thats why I'm here, and not the Cybertronian Fire. My programing 
may be
> Maximal, but I'll do anything to be with you. That includes staying 
with
> the Alliance."
> That was an exageration. He wasn't sure if he would really work for 
the
> Alliance. He was torn between his Maximal/Autobot heritage, and his 
love
> for her.
> 
> He looked at her wounds.
> "You need a CR. The question is, the Alliance base, or the CF. If 
you
> ask me you are more like a Maximal. You have a kind good natured 
spark.
> You were serving the Alliance cause Zardus reprogramed you.(Thats 
what
> happaned right?) That programing is gong now. You arn't a Alliance
> temptress anymore. You and me are alike.
> I want to stay with you, no matter what. Now you have to decide 
between
> Alliance or Maximal. Just remember I'll stay no matter what you 
pick."
> 
> He put his hands on her cheeks, rubing away any tears.
> "Omae o korosu," he said in Japanese.
> He then kissed her, with all the love he felt for her.
